TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Having to do with the area outside or behind the peritoneum (the tissue that lines the abdominal wall and covers most of the organs in the abdomen).

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Relacionado con el área de afuera o atrás del peritoneo (el tejido que reviste la pared abdominal y recubre la mayoría de los órganos del abdomen).
